argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eflgam | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( exp ` ( log_G ` A ) ) = ( _G ` A ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( 1 / ( exp ` ( log_G ` A ) ) ) = ( 1 / ( _G ` A ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_lgamcl | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( log_G ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_efneg | |- ( ( log_G ` A ) e. CC -> ( exp ` -u ( log_G ` A ) ) = ( 1 / ( exp ` ( log_G ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( exp ` -u ( log_G ` A ) ) = ( 1 / ( exp ` ( log_G ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_igamgam | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( 1/_G ` A ) = ( 1 / ( _G ` A ) ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 5, 6 | #P_3eqtr4rd | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( 1/_G ` A ) = ( exp ` -u ( log_G ` A ) ) ) |
